code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{storiesAPI}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Community=()=>{const[stories,setStories]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchStories=async()=>{try{const response=await storiesAPI.getAll();setStories(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching stories:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchStories();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xl",children:"Loading stories..."})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 py-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-12 text-gray-800",children:"Community Stories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-gray-600 mb-12 max-w-2xl mx-auto",children:"Read inspiring testimonies and stories from our community members. Each story is a testament to God's grace and faithfulness."}),stories.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center text-gray-600",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xl",children:"No stories available yet."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Be the first to share your story!"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8",children:stories.map(story=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6 hover:shadow-xl transition duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-12 h-12 bg-yellow-500 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center text-white font-semibold",children:story.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ml-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-semibold text-gray-800",children:story.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:new Date(story.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-3 text-gray-800",children:story.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 whitespace-pre-line",children:story.story}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"inline-block bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm capitalize",children:story.category.replace('-',' ')})})]},story._id))})]})});};export default Community;
